product_name: Panaracer Tourguard Pasela Bike Tire - 26 x 1.5
long_description: A standard tire for urban commuting or touring, the 26 x 1.5 in. Panaracer Tourguard Pasela tire offers a smooth-rolling tread pattern that provides good grip and sheds water. Lightweight belt under the tread uses a strong fiber composition for puncture resistance.
short_description: A standard tire for urban commuting or touring, the 26 x 1.5 in. Panaracer Tourguard Pasela tire offers a smooth-rolling tread pattern that provides good grip and sheds water.
